entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Prévost
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:25 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -10.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Montréal-Mirabel Int'l Airport 10:55 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -10.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 40.2 km
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -12.8°C
Wind: SW 32 km/h gust 49 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
